apple_vendor_description: This heartwarming emoji on Apple devices showcases a couple with distinct medium and medium-light skin tones, their hands gently clasped and a luminous heart radiating affection between them. Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting create a soft, romantic glow, emphasizing the warmth and connection shared by the pair. The rounded edges and subtle 3D depth make this depiction of love and partnership feel tender and genuine.
